Firedrill stepped out of the Autobot base, and looked up at the hovering
ship, wondering why the man using the computers didnt tell them to land.
He was not in the mood to fool around, and simply wanted this to come to
an end. He began to wave his arms way over his head, signaling for them
to land beside him. He winced as one of his severed joints tore against
it's will, being to damaged to move that way, but he did not care, and
kept on signaling.
